content: 1 gatekeeper by christa weber @thehowlingwool in the past few years i began the tradition of knitting a hat for each of my nieces and nephews for christmas each year i like to keep the pattern the same for everyone but choose different yarns to suit the likes of everyone s individual personalities i am always on the lookout for great unisex hat patterns that would work for any and every person and any and every yarn i wrote gatekeeper with this in mind it showcases ribbing throughout but with enough added interest to not only give the eye something to admire but also to keep me - the knitter - engaged and wanting to come back and knit it again and again gatekeeper comes in four sizes to choose from - but because the ribbing provides a lot of stretch you don t have to worry too much about guessing the correct size as each size could fit a variety of head sizes this is great news if you are knitting for a young one who is expected to grow or if you are knitting a gift and maybe you re not exactly sure of the measurements of the recipient s head gatekeeper ©christa weber 2022 all rights reserved @thehowlingwool 2 sizes toddler child adult s adult l to fit head
